doc:
Vesta Tilley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vesta_Tilley 0 Matilda Alice Powles (13 May 1864 – 16 September 1952), was an English music hall performer who adopted, at age 11, the stage name Vesta Tilley and who became one of the most famous male impersonators of her era. She was a star in both Britain and the United States for over thirty years. Matilda_Alice_Powles ( 13_May_1864 – 16_September_1952 ) , was an_English_music_hall_performer who adopted , at age_11 , the_stage_name_Vesta_Tilley and who became one of the_most_famous_male_impersonators of her_era . She was a_star in both Britain and the_United_States for over_thirty_years .
